about_the_game:
Outrun eternity. Endlessly.

HYPERBEAT is a rhythm game with an original soundtrack, workshop support, and easy to learn but hard to master gameplay. Use your weapon of choice to slash your way through jungle and rave inspired beats, with each note flying at you indicating whether you slash, ride, or dodge your way through an endless dream.

Features

Customize your HYPERKNIGHT with alternate cosmetics and palettes as you progress through the adventure.

Original soundtrack with a progression system. Workshop support is available.

Fast paced rhythm gameplay with both mouse and keyboard and controller support.

Difficulties and accessibility options to tailor your gaming experience to your preferences.
